alert.note: Alert for Clay; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 04 at 10:46AM MST until January 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Clay and Union Counties. In Nebraska, Dixon and Dakota Counties. In Iowa, Plymouth, Cherokee, Buena Vista, Woodbury and Ida Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A short lived burst of light snow will be possible this evening after sunset and could briefly reduce the visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
